perturbation.original_text: 1.20 "Improvements" shall mean all discoveries and inventions, and all modifications, derivatives and improvements to Technology or new uses thereof (whether or not protectable under patent, trademark, copyright or similar laws) that are discovered, developed or reduced to practice by or on behalf of BII or any of its Affiliated Companies (alone or jointly with XENCOR) in the performance of this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: 1.20 "Enhancements" shall mean all discoveries and inventions, and all modifications, derivatives and improvements to Technology or new uses thereof (whether or not protectable under patent, trademark, copyright or similar laws) that are discovered, developed or reduced to practice by or on behalf of BII or any of its Affiliated Companies (alone or jointly with XENCOR) in the performance of this Agreement.
perturbation.explanation: The term **'Improvements'** was replaced with **'Enhancements'**, creating legal uncertainty. Improvements have a clear **legal definition** under patent law, whereas 'enhancements' is vague and open to interpretation. This contradicts the intent of the contract and could lead to disputes over **ownership of discoveries**.
perturbation.contradicted_law: United States Patent Law, specifically definitions related to patentable improvements

perturbation.original_text: 1.19 "FTE" shall mean a fully allocated employee or consultant of BII and working on the Technology transfer with such time and effort to constitute the equivalent of one (1) employee on a full time basis consistent with normal business and scientific practice […***…].
perturbation.changed_text: 1.19 "Labor Unit" shall mean a fully allocated employee or consultant of BII and working on the Technology transfer with such time and effort to constitute the equivalent of one (1) employee on a full time basis consistent with normal business and scientific practice […***…].
perturbation.explanation: The term **'FTE'** was replaced with **'Labor Unit'**, creating legal uncertainty. Full-time equivalent has a clear **legal definition** under labor law, whereas 'labor unit' is vague and open to interpretation. This contradicts the intent of the contract and could lead to disputes over **how hours worked are calculated**.
perturbation.contradicted_law: United States Labor Law, specifically definitions related to full-time equivalent employees.

perturbation.original_text: 1.12 "Confidential Information­and Know­How" shall mean either or both Xencor Confidential Information and Know-How (as defined herein) or BII Confidential Information and Know- How (as defined herein), as applicable.
perturbation.changed_text: 1.12 "Private Communications" shall mean either or both Xencor Confidential Information and Know-How (as defined herein) or BII Confidential Information and Know- How (as defined herein), as applicable.
perturbation.explanation: The term **'Confidential Information­and Know­How'** was replaced with **'Private Communications'**, creating legal uncertainty. Confidential Information and Know How has a clear **legal definition** under trade secret law, whereas 'private communications' is vague and open to interpretation. This contradicts the intent of the contract and could lead to disputes over **what information is protected**.
perturbation.contradicted_law: United States Trade Secret Law, specifically definitions related to what constitutes a trade secret.
